name: GameJam: Bird of Prey
description:
Android version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

Use just two buttons to fly gracefully through the air, scan the ground below for prey, dive and pursue, catch and devour.

  • Flap (hold and release) both wings to gain altitude and pitch
  • Hold both wings in to dive
  • Release both wings to glide
  • Hold one wing to bank
  • Press both buttons when near prey to devour
  • Prey lives in yellow grass and feeds at trees

There's no goal here other than to enjoy flying and eat as many peanut shaped rodents as you like.

Special thanks to pgarcia from http://awesome.commodore.me/ for inspiring the control system and @meta_sarah for being the best <3
